title: Executors’ names
question: What are the executors’ names?
paragraph: Write the names of all the executors, exactly as they appear on the will.

required.summary: You haven’t entered an executor’s name

invalid.summary: The names you enter can only contain letters a to z, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes
invalid.message: The names you enter can only contain letters a to z, spaces, hyphens and apostrophes
